results.description_highlighted: ...Told in colloquial Tamil, this is a great bed time stories to listen with your children.
results.description_original:
Umavudan Kadhai Neram is a fascinating narrative that deports you to the magical land of ancient Rajas and Ranis. Told in colloquial Tamil, this is a great bed time stories to listen with your children. It narrates Vikramadithan stories and others from Chola/Pandiya times, in a format that is interesting and accessible to the young / young at heart.
Tune in for the first in the series - Vikramadithan Kadhaigal as told by Padumaigal in the Kanagamani Simmasanam. Subscribe and enjoy listening!!

results.description_highlighted: ...PS: In this podcast, the modern day spoken Tamil (with some English words) is used for easy understanding of the stories. Emailto: o2kadhai@gmail.com
results.description_original:
Welcome to OruOorula...Kadhai Podcast. Story telling to the Kids is part of our Tamil culture. Through stories, our parents and grand parents carried forward our cultural aspects, good habits and morality. This Podcast motive is to encourage kids listening to stories in Tamil language. This will improve the listening skills, imagination and concentration. I hope you will listen and enjoy every stories.
PS: In this podcast, the modern day spoken Tamil (with some English words) is used for easy understanding of the stories.

Emailto: o2kadhai@gmail.com

results.description_highlighted: ...The podcast in Easy and Understanding Tamil. "Parthiban Kanavu" A book by Kalki. Watch out new episodes every Monday. "Cheran Selvi" a book by Sandiliyan.
results.description_original:
Hi, Welcome to World of Bharani's. We share podcast based on historic stories, books, religious, and entertainment. The podcast in Easy and Understanding Tamil. 

"Parthiban Kanavu" A book by Kalki.
 Watch out new episodes every Monday. 

"Cheran Selvi" a book by Sandiliyan. 
 Watch out new episodes every Wednesday, Saturdays. 

"Nandipurattu Nayagi" a Book by Vikraman.
Watch out new episodes every Sunday, Thursdays.
